page.title: 02Attitudes Rosneath:Army Rhu
page.content: We visited lady who has lived in The Clachan since before last war. Regrets loss of view due to house building. Used to see up loch to Garelochhead and her house surrounded by fields which now built over. Skyline has dark ened because conifers planted in place of broad leaved trees. Although she preferred pre-war is not unhappy with present and doesn't think will be much change in future. Old people not much affected by bases except for traffic. Indigenous population dwindling and newcomers increasing. Former still run ning St.Modan's & bowling club while latter run Community Council & Assoc. ARMED FORCES Army Rhu The Slipway and Army Supplies Depot services the Outer Hebrides Rocket Range.
